title: Landscape Architecture and Site Planning - Introduction to Landscape Design
headline: Learn about the background and professional scope of landscape design and site planning from this free online course.
description: This free online Landscape Architecture and Site Planning - Introduction to Landscape Design course will guide you through the basic concepts in landscape design. Learn about the various landscape categories and design materials, and the professional scope of landscape design projects. Start this course today and improve your architectural knowledge and skills.
courseDescription:
This free online course Introduction to Landscape Design is the first in the Architectural Landscape and Site Planning suite of courses. This course is specifically designed to guide you through the fundamental aspects of landscape design. First, you will learn about the multi-disciplinary scope of Landscape Architecture and the vital components of the subject.

Next, you will learn about popular methods of landscaping and the relationship between architectural design and landscape design. Then, you will study the major landscape categories and relevant landscape design materials. Finally, you will discuss the objectives and professional scope of landscape design projects.

By taking this online course from Alison, you will gain vital knowledge of the fundamentals of landscape architecture and site planning. This course is ideal for students, researchers, and anyone with an interest in understanding the basics of landscape design. Begin the course today and boost your design knowledge and skills!
